website_summaries.verdict: Outdoorsy individuals who are searching for a light and comfy hiking shoe may want to give the Ultimate Pro Low GTX a try. Those who value water protection and a grippy outsole may also find themselves pleased with this Mammut offering. On the other hand, the footgear’s lack of sturdiness might be a deal-breaker for some. To conclude, buyers may have a fulfilling experience with the Mammut Ultimate Pro Low GTX, granted they can get past its durability issues.
pros: A lot of buyers say that the Mammut Ultimate Pro Low GTX’s lightness is very commendable
According to numerous owners, it is an astonishingly comfortable hiking shoe
A handful of users mention that its Gore-Tex liner is effective in keeping water out
Based on some consumer reviews, this Mammut offering gives a good grip on most types of ground conditions
A bunch of purchasers applauds the footgear’s breathability
cons: Several customers declare that the Mammut Ultimate Pro Low GTX’s sole came apart after a few uses
Some wearers comment that this hiking shoe lacks arch support

customer_reviews.title: great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Well pleased with my purchase, really comfy walking shoe and very light and smart enough to wear down the pub Would recommend. Edit update, 19/01.19 I have been using these shoes for a few months now, the soles are wearing well and now they have broken in, they even more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ray T Walker

customer_reviews.title: Peefect for very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit sizing as expected. Extremely comfortable on long walks.I'm have thin feet these fir perfectly, knowing this I'm assuming they are quite a thin fit so if you have wide feet maybe double check sizing before ordering
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Best. Shoes Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Had these a few weeks now and I have to report that I can't remember owning a more comfortable outdoor shoe. Utterly waterproof and well constructed, absolutely zero complaints from me. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the insole so thin after 7 miles my ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the insole so thin after 7 miles my feet were sore, I ended up buying new insoles so lets hop that fixes the problem. I already own a pair of mountain hiking boots from Mammut and they are perfect. I have the highest respect for Mammut and the products are usually of the highest quality
customer_reviews.author: Lumsden Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Don't get any dirt or water on them whatsoever or they will be ruined
customer_reviews.text: Got to wear them once. Got caught in the rain (which I didn't think would be a problem) so when I got home they had wet mud on, I cleaned them an they looked perfect until they dried an the stains all reappeared. They look awful, ready for the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Bow

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy BUT terrible off path
customer_reviews.text: So, these shoes are super comfy, feels like you don't have shoes on after a while, real good. BUT these are not 'hiking' shoes as mammuts website suggests, you take these up a hill or anything off a light path and these shoes don't have enough support.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are the best trainers I've ever owned, which is why I have them in two colours!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Rorison

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these shoes that my husband has had. He loves them so much, very comfortable and very hard wearing, he wears them for work and for outdoor walking so they get used every day a lot. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: sarah catlin

customer_reviews.title: these shoes were realy good
customer_reviews.text: these were realy good shoe but would go up a size as memory foam insole makes them tight
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Small fit
customer_reviews.text: Very small fitting, go for a full size bigger than you normally take, also quite narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B. Tribick

customer_reviews.title: Very light weighted.
customer_reviews.text: I using this trainers for every day use. They are very light but so far keeping the shape. Not slippery on wet surface. I reckon I find the best replacement for my previous every day shoos.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Have tried them all now and finally got to these. Look like black army plimsolls I used to get issued. But, amazingly comfortable, waterproof and excellent grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes 4 hikking
customer_reviews.text: Really good one. I buy the size i am used to and fotos perfect. It Is very ligth. I am planning to use this for the great Glen way and the Pilgrim to Compostela.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET HALF A SIZE BIGGER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Get half a size bigger than your usual size for a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Clark

customer_reviews.title: It fits me really well
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected to be a perfect shoe for going almost anywhere , starting from city center caffe to a mountain , to the gym or just for a walk , it is perfect and it deserves every penny .
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a lightweight walking shoe to replace a pair of old AKUs .. so I thought I’d give these a go . I followed their sizing instructions and have no problem with fit. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: N. Dormand

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, lightweight, nice looking, good price comparing to competitors. Haven't had a chance to wear them yet
customer_reviews.author: Trajce Popov

product_meta.title: Mammut Men's Ultimate Pro Gtxâ Low Rise Hiking Shoes
product_meta.description: Ultimate Multifunctional and Comfortable Inspired by our ultimate clothing line, the Ultimate Pro Low GTX is a tough and versatile multifunctional shoe. Thanks to the waterproof Gore-Tex performance footwear membrane with elastic lining and the use of seamless shoeller soft shell, the shoe offers superior comfort and soft material properties. Thanks to gripex Tri traction sole with two different soft rubber mixes, the patented Rolling Concept as well as a well-cushioning ip-eva foam wedge as an agile all-rounder in technical terrain.
feature_bullets: Soft shell: soft, breathable, water-repellent synthetic fabric, elastic Gore-Tex material, 3M reflective elements, hybrid shell: mix of soft inner and stable outer materials. More comfort. Better adaptability. Base Cage: Three TPU support elements in the midsole area. Support the longitudinal arch. Gives greater foot safety, comfort and reduce fatigue.

Rolling Concept: Patented Mammut sole concept: the support for the foot and the cushioning support the natural rolling behaviour and thus reduce fatigue (risk of bending). Weather protection rim, twisted style, gripex outsole technology.
